properties.name: imagesData
properties.label: Images URL
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for getting data for rendering images. Type of data is an array of objects, every object should have field "URL" with image URL and optionally field 'title' with text for every image.

properties.name: gap
properties.label: Gap
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set the distance between images.

properties.name: imageHeight
properties.label: Image Height
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set image height.

properties.name: borderRadius
properties.label: Image Border Radius
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set image border radius.

properties.name: wrapAround
properties.label: Wrap Around
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for toggling gallery loops.  If true, when a user reaches the last image in a set, the right navigation arrow will appear and they will be to continue moving forward which will take them back to the first image in the set.

properties.name: alwaysShowNavOnTouchDevices
properties.label: Nav On Mobile
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to enable navigation for touchscreens. If true, the left and right navigation arrows which appear on mouse hover when viewing image sets will always be visible on devices that support touch.

properties.name: showImageNumberLabel
properties.label: Show Image Number Label
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for toggle image label and separator block visibility.

properties.name: disableScrolling
properties.label: Disable Scrolling
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler for toggle scrolling. If true, prevent the page from scrolling while Lightbox is open.

properties.name: imageLabel
properties.label: Image Label
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set image label.

properties.name: separator
properties.label: Separator
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set separator.

properties.name: fadeDuration
properties.label: Fade Duration(ms)
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set fade duration. The time it takes for the Lightbox container and overlay to fade in and out, in milliseconds.

properties.name: imageFadeDuration
properties.label: Image Fade Duration(ms)
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set image fade duration. The time it takes for the image to fade in once loaded, in milliseconds.

properties.name: positionFromTop
properties.label: Position From Top(px)
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set the distance from top of viewport that the Lightbox container will appear, in pixels.

properties.name: resizeDuration
properties.label: Resize Duration(ms)
properties.handlerDescription: This is a handler to set the time it takes for the Lightbox container to animate its width and height when transition between different size images, in milliseconds.
